description: Rumer Willis, 27, had every reason to be self-assured when she rocked a glamorous, yet racy, dress for the InStyle and Warner Bros. Golden Globes afterparty.
title: Dancing With The Star's Rumer Willis flashes cleavage at Golden Globes 2016 afterparty
title_page: Dancing With The Star's Rumer Willis flashes cleavage at Golden Globes 2016 afterparty | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's a body-confident woman whose active career keeps her in tip-top shape.
And Rumer Willis, 27, had every reason to be self-assured when she rocked a glamorous, yet racy, dress for the InStyle and Warner Bros. Golden Globes afterparty at the Beverly Hilton hotel on Sunday night.
The gorgeous gown revealed not only the brunette beauty's plentiful cleavage and toned tum as it plunged to just above her navel, put also her extremely pert posterior.
Scroll down for video
Wow! Rumer Willis, 27, had every reason to be self-assured when she rocked a glamorous, yet racy, dress for the InStyle and Warner Bros. Golden Globes afterparty at the Beverly Hilton hotel on Sunday night
The Dancing With The Stars champion posed for photographs with plenty of sass, switching between front-facing and sideways stances with her hand on her hip.
Rumer's white underwear was visible through the patterned garment and as she turned to the side she revealed her bountiful derriere.
Sporting a golden glow for the star-studded bash, her complexion was flawless and her make-up classily applied.
Doing her thing: The Dancing With The Stars champion posed for photographs with plenty of sass, switching between front-facing and sideways stances with her hand on her hip
Glowing: Sporting a golden glow for the star-studded bash, her complexion was flawless and her make-up classily applied
The star's eyes were framed by lashings of mascara and heavy eyeliner, while she went for a nude lipstick which matched her impressively manicured nails.
Her short raven locks were slicked back for the occasion and perfectly complemented her black clutch.
Keeping things glamorous with her choice of accessories, Rumer sported a pair of dangly silver earrings and an eye-catching pearl ring.
Wide-eyed: The star's eyes were framed by lashings of mascara and heavy eyeliner, while she went for a nude lipstick which matched her impressively manicured nails
It's been a fun-filled weekend for Rumer, which saw her party with veteran actress Melanie Griffith at an LA art bash on Friday.
The pair were spotted at the Photographs by Kelly Klein event, which was hosted by Barry Diller and Jason Weinberg at BOA Steakhouse in West Hollywood.
Last year was a whirlwind for the actress, with 2016 showing no signs of slowing down.
Aside from starring as Roxie Hart on Chicago and winning Dancing With The Stars, Rumer also appeared on SWAY: A Dance Trilogy.
Glamorous: Keeping things glamorous with her choice of accessories, Rumer sported a pair of dangly silver earrings and an eye-catching pearl ring
Strike a pose: Rumer cosies-up to Katherine Schwarzenegger, who dazzled in a green dress
Good pals; The young women shared a warm embrace as they bumped into each other on the red carpet
Looking good: The brunette beauty, 26, certainly dressed to impress in her plunging gown
